text: Apani ki taderake laksya karena na, yaderake gopana paramarsa karate nisedha kara hayechila? Tarapara tara ya nisid'dha tara'i punarabrtti kare ebam papacarana, simalanghana o rasulera birud'dhacaranera jan'ya gopana paramarsa kare [1]. Ara tara yakhana apanara kache ase takhana tara apanake emana katha dbara abhibadana kare ya dbara allaha apanake abhibadana karenani.
